name: The Team
detailed_description:
Steam Video

This content is only available in an online streaming format. More information about streaming videos can be found in the Streaming Videos on Steam FAQ.


About the Video

Two brothers are up against the wall when they’re threatened by a construction company to sell their family land, which also happens to be the local neighborhood’s soccer pitch. Facing eviction from the bank on a loan gone bad, and with no options left, the two must turn to the only thing they know: Soccer. Facing insurmountable odds, the brothers must band together with a group of neighborhood “misfits” to field a team for a renowned soccer tournament. It’s a must win match if they’re going to win the money needed to stop their eviction and save their beloved community soccer pitch. The Team tells the tale of a group of street soccer players from all walks of life who must come together to save their favorite soccer pitch from ruthless developers. The story is loosely based on the very real urban phenomenon of gentrification happening all over the world, as large construction companies are displacing and destroying small communities in their pursuit of ever higher profits.

The story is loosely based on the very real urban phenomenon of gentrification happening all over the world, as large construction companies are displacing and destroying small communities in their pursuit of ever higher profits.
short_description: In order to raise the money needed to save their neighborhood from the hands of a ruthless development company, a misfit group of street soccer players must come together as a real team to win a local soccer tournament and use the prize money to save their community.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Network Bandwidth of 5Mbps for 540p, 3Mbps for 360p.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core I3+ or AMD equivalent recommended for HD 1080p playback
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Network Bandwidth of 12Mbps for 1080p or 8Mbps for 720p.
